title: Login issue on dashboard
description: Customer unable to log in to the admin dashboard.

title: Payment gateway error
description: Transaction failing at checkout for Visa cards.

title: Slow website loading
description: Homepage taking more than 8 seconds to load.

title: App crash on Android 12
description: Mobile app crashing on login for Android 12 devices.

title: Email notification not sent
description: Order confirmation emails are not being sent.

title: Search function not working
description: Search bar returns no results even for existing products.

title: Broken images on product page
description: Images missing on multiple product pages.

title: Security vulnerability alert
description: Potential XSS vulnerability detected by scanner.

title: Export to CSV not working
description: User unable to export reports to CSV format.
